    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game

      class Game extends Observable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • availableColors
          List<Color> availableColors
          List of available colors for the players.
        • chatHandler
          Chat chatHandler
          chatHandler is the chat of the game.
        • disconnections
          int disconnections
          Number of disconnected players.
        • firstPlayer
          Player firstPlayer
          firstPlayer is the player that will play first.
        • gameBoard
          GameBoard gameBoard
          GameBoard is the board where the game is played.
        • gameFull
          boolean gameFull
          gameFull is a boolean that is true if the game has reached the maximum number of players.
        • gameState
          GameState gameState
          GameState is the state the game is currently in.
        • lobbySize
          int lobbySize
          LobbySize is the number of players that the game can host.
        • playerInTurn
          Player playerInTurn
          playerInTurn is the player that is currently playing.
        • players
          ArrayList<Player> players
          Players is the list of players that are currently in the game.
        • willPlay
          int willPlay
          willPlay is the index of the player that will play next.

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player

      class Player extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cardInHand
          Card[] cardInHand
          Contains the cards in the player's hand.
        • chat
          ArrayList<String> chat
          List of messages sent by and to the player.
        • chosenObj
          Achievement chosenObj
          The personal objective chosen by the player.
        • disconnected
          boolean disconnected
          Indicates whether a player is connected or not.
        • firstToEnd
          boolean firstToEnd
          Boolean value that is true if the player was the first to reach 20 points.
        • firstToPlay
          boolean firstToPlay
          Boolean value that is true if the player is the first to play in the game.
        • game
          Game game
          Link to the game which the player belongs to.
        • objCompleted
          int objCompleted
          Number of achievements completed.
        • personalObj
          Achievement[] personalObj
          Contains the two personal achievements the player can choose from.
        • pionColor
          Color pionColor
          Represents the color chosen by the player.
        • playerBoard
          PlayerBoard playerBoard
          Link to the player's board where he can place his cards.
        • playerState
          PlayerState playerState
          State of the player.
        • points
          int points
          Player's points.
        • username
          String username
          Unique player name.

          Integer id

          The list of the opponents.

          PlayerBean player
          The player bean.

          int port
          The port of the server.

          boolean processingAction
          The flag to check if the client is processing an action.

          The reconnection thread. Every second it tries to reconnect to the server.

          Timer reconnectionTimer

          The skeleton of the server.
